definitions: solve serious problems for a company or other organization

examples.text: when managers troubleshoot, it strengthens the whole team
an overworked executive who zips from country to country troubleshooting problems

shortDefinitions: analyse and solve serious problems for company or other organization

definitions: trace and correct faults in a mechanical or electronic system

examples.text: follow the error messages to troubleshoot
courses dealing with PC repair and troubleshooting are proving to be heavily subscribed

shortDefinitions: trace and correct faults in mechanical or electronic system
